DOC.brief_summary: Chronic infection total joint arthroplasty generally require implant exchange . Two stage exchange consider gold standard procedure . However , author suggest one stage exchange may effective . No consensus exist current literature . The purpose study evaluate cost strategy comparison success rate .
DOC.brief_title: Cost-effectiveness Evaluation One Stage Versus Two Stage Exchange Chronically Infected Total Hip Total Knee Prostheses
DOC.detailed_description: The primary criterion cost-utility ratio ( ICER ) 12 month follow-up . The secondary criterion : - quality life ; - pain ; - persistence recurrence infection ; - occurrence complication ; - necessity reoperation .
